name: CreateShipment
description:
Create a new shipment

It is required to specify an Order. This can be done with `OrderID` or by sending `OrderBackendID` and `OrderBackendSystemID`.

To create a pending Shipment, set `IsPending` to true. A pending shipment has to be shipped with the ShipShipment service.

properties.name: OrderBackendID
properties.description: Reference to the order that is being shipped - required when `OrderID` is omitted

properties.name: OrderBackendSystemID
properties.description: Reference to the system from which the order originated - required when `OrderID` is omitted

properties.name: OrderID
properties.description: ID of the order that is being shipped - required when `OrderBackendID` and `OrderBackendSystemID` are omitted

properties.name: PackageID
properties.description: Optional. When only lines are provided, the PackageID can be used to create a package for all lines.

properties.name: ShippedFromOrganizationUnitID
properties.description: Optional, will be determined based on the Order
